title: Chesd

author: Brian Crail
comment: Needs a save feature. I had to manually search to find it. For some reason wear apps are not very organized on the Store. Glad I found this.

reply.author: Emerald Co.
reply.content:
Thank you for your review.

Until save is introduced we have a workaround for you, press your watch button to pause and close the app. you can reopen the app at any time to resume. We are very disappointed with how poorly Google is publicising our product on the store, please help us spread the word about our app! thank you for your rating.

title: Fun

author: Barry Morgan
comment: Great little game but playing a full game on your watch is a bit too much for my tea breaks etc a save game function would be excellent for this as you won't have to to start over each time, add this and it will be a very worthwhile addition to any smart watch it just doesn't make sense without it. This is probably already in the works but point made anyway.

reply.author: Emerald Co.
reply.content:
You read our minds Barry!

We're implementing a save game function but this will be featured along with many other features to come. 

For the time being a workaround for you, you can save a game by pressing your watch button during gameplay, the game will be running in the background in low power mode and can be revived later by opening the app

title: Finally here!

author: Alexander Chekalyuk
comment: It is really nice to have your favorite game literally "at hand". The interface is nice, and it technically works well.  I am not a strong player, but I usually win even at the " hard" level of the game.  The computer algorithm has to be a bit "smarter" to make it more challenging and attractive for advanced players.  UPDATE on version 1.0.16: I appreciate the improvements and new features, but the computer algorithm still needs enhancement. Keep your good work!

reply.author: Emerald Co.
reply.content:
Hello Alexander,

We've got at the moment a basic AI (chess Ai is quite difficult) but soon we will implement harder and harder AI to challenge even seasoned players.

The difficulties will eventually be shifted with what is now hard becoming easy and hard mode being replaced with advanced AI

This will be released in the coming days so stay tuned

reply.author: Emerald Co.
reply.content:
As of version 1.0.11 this is no longer an issue as the fault has been corrected

Kind regards
